page.title: 02WEEKDAYS/WEEKENDS WICKERSLEY
page.content: { WEEKDAYS AND WEEKENDS IN WICKERSLEY Before I get up the milkman and the postman come.The milkman delivers bottles of milk and cream and eggs.My alarm clock goes off I try to find the button to turn it off.I switch on my television so I can watch Good Morning Britain.For my breakfast I have tea or orange cereal and toast.I feed the dog and the cat.The cat has milk and Whiskas.The dog has milk,Bonio and Marrowbone biscuits.In our kitchen where we often eat is a fridge an automatic washing machine and an oven and microwave.After I have washed myself and cleaned my teeth I go to school.School begins at 8.55.My father works at a furniture shop in Wombwell from 8.30 to 5.30 and is a part time policeman.My mum is a cashier.She works shifts 9 till 2 and 2 till 8.I work at school until 12.00.Then I go
